cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control transforms, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
{2}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a double faced card, reveal it, then put it on top of your library

Double strike
Tactical ninjutsu {2}{U}{B}{R} [i]({U}{B}{R}, Returned a blocker or unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking or blocking the same creature.)[/i] [i]({2}{U}{B}{R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control enters, if a ninjutsu cost was paid, put two +1/+1 counters on that creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I have seen the brilliance of the light and I have seen the beauty of the dark.”[/i]
